description.en:
FANTOM is a new DAG based Smart Contract platform that intends to solve the scalability issues of existing public distributed ledger technologies. 

The platform intends to distinguish itself from the traditional block ledger-based storage infrastructure by attempting to employ an improved version of existing DAG-based pro-tocols. The FANTOM platform adopts a new protocol known as the “Lachesis Protocol” to maintain consensus. This protocol is intended to be integrated into the Fantom OPERA Chain. The aim is to allow applications built on top of the FANTOM OPERA Chain to enjoy instant transactions and near zero transaction costs for all users. 

The mission of FANTOM is to provide compatibility between all transaction bodies around the world, and create an ecosystem which allows real-time transactions and data sharing with low cost.

status_updates.description:
Releasing our latest technical update, with progress on Go-lachesis performance, Fantom Finance #DeFi, our PWA Wallet, and the new Special Fee Contract. $FTM

https://fantom.foundation/fantom-technical-update-12th-august-2020/

A more detailed look at why Smart Medicine is a use case we're keen to push forward with, following our recent collaboration with Afghanistan's Ministry of Public Health.

$FTM 

https://fantom.foundation/tracking-medical-products-on-fantom/

#DeFi collateral integration

Ontology $ONT will be onboarded as collateral for Fantom Finance. Holders will be able to mint synthetics (including $fUSD), lend & borrow, as well as trade. 

All while keeping their exposure to $ONT.

$FTM

https://fantom.foundation/ontology-joins-fantom-defi-ont-collateral-integration/

Tokoin's $TOKO will be added as collateral for Fantom #DeFi - holders will be able to use all the functionality Fantom Finance has to offer. $FTM

https://fantom.foundation/tokoin-joins-fantom-defi-toko-collateral-integration/

Frontier will support Fantom's Opera network, bringing Fantom Finance #DeFi and staking functionality to a whole host of mobile wallets. $FTM 

https://fantom.foundation/frontier-x-fantom-defi-integration/

We're collaborating with @suterusu_io to bring privacy transactions to the Fantom ecosystem using their layer-2 technology.

https://fantom.foundation/suterusu-integration-privacy-transactions-on-fantom-opera/

FTM is now available to trade using isolated margin - up to 5x on Binance. 

https://www.binance.com/en/support/articles/5440bf7c4b9a4e5895fe8f4f031c7625
